DOC.brief_summary: Women request analgesia always wish receive potent analgesic method , may fear risk epidural analgesia . Study Aim : To determine whether remifentanil effective labor analgesia compare standard treatment ( epidural analgesia ) .
DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Remifentanil Patient-controlled Analgesia ( PCA ) Epidural Patient Controlled Epidural Analgesia ( PCEA ) Labor Analgesia
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy woman American Society Anesthesiologists physical status class I II Body weight less 110 kg In active labor ( include induce labor premature rupture membrane ) Cervical dilatation 26 cm Regular contraction Age 18 40 year old Gestational age great 36 complete week Singleton pregnancy vertex presentation Exclusion criterion : Contraindication epidural analgesia ( bleed diathesis , neuropathy , severe scoliosis , previous spine surgery , local anesthetic allergy ) Narcotic administration previous 2 hour Previous uterine surgery Preeclampsia inability adequately understand consent form Blocked nose , indication patient epidural analgesia medically indicate ( cardiac disease , suspect difficult airway )
